website_summaries.verdict: The Avia Avi-Union II received a mix of positive and negative reviews. The outsole also gained conflicting reviews because there were claims that it provided adequate traction while others stated that it did not have any grip on wet floors. The durability is another point of contention. Though the Avi-Union II was generally comfortable, its durability and outsole quality were factors for some people not to repurchase this model.
pros: A majority of the reviewers were impressed by how comfortable the Avia Avi-Union II was for long periods of walking and standing
The fit was considered to be perfect by numerous users
A fair number of folks claimed that the outsole provided adequate grip even on wet surfaces
Some buyers lauded the durability of the product
The upper was deemed supportive by a few wearers
cons: A significant number of shoppers complained about the durability of the Avia Avi-Union II because the sole unit detached from the upper with just a few months of use
The outsole was said to be slippery on kitchen floors, as stated by some service crew purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Velcro sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit except the body of the shoe is a bit large. The shoe size is a proper fit but the main foot compartment is a bit on the large size and can feel loose on the foot requiring extra tension of the Velcro tabs. Not a deal breaker but something you should know.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide.. means extra wide.  Thats a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: I got the velcro tennis shoes for my autistic son..I really like them and he finially accepted them. (transitions are hard sometimes.) Its no fault of the shoe..its just that when I order them they didnt have just Wide..it was only extra wide..so I thought I would give them a try..Well they are really too wide for him and wished they had the Wide option..I just pull the velcro really tight and he seems ok with that. Im not sure if thats good either..but again..I love the shoe just not the option I had for the size. Its a new brand for us and I like them alot better than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet, with high arches. These are the first shoes I have found in years that fit perfect. There was no need to break them in and they seem to be well made. I have had an operation on one foot that still swells a little some times yet I am back to my real shoe size. They fit that well.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mad Charlie

customer_reviews.title: USED Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they arrived USED. They been worn they are dirty and have dirt and grass all over the bottom. We have ask for refund will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: My guy is a very large man with wide fee and diabetic neuropathy. These shoes fit him perfectly and they are wide enough with velcro straps for ease of putting them on. He said they are VERY comfortable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Day

customer_reviews.title: A very good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to put on. I am disabled and the Velcro straps make it easier to put on. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Accurate Fitting
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for the $$$$. And fit 'exactly' as ordered.......which is RARE for many shoe makers. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but too small
customer_reviews.text: My old size 9 shoes were a bit snug so I ordered these in 9.5. Although the label says 9.5 they are size 9 at best. I'm returning and ordering 10.5 this time. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. The velcro seems really strong
customer_reviews.author: Saxiana

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, time will tell how they hold up to wear.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: nice fit ,comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This set fits real nice ,not tight in toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was dead on correct. Shoe is very well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The product was cut way too small . The size 10 I ordered felt like a 9, totally unwareable. Also the material in the inside felt like rough canvas
customer_reviews.author: gerald angus

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Just over two months old and both soles are coming unglued.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Tomilson

customer_reviews.title: Shoe seems to run small
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. Fits well. Depending on manufacturer, I usually get a 10.5 to 11.5 shoe. Bought a 11.5 since I wanted it as a house shoe. Too small. Had to buy a 12, which fits good. Most of my shoes are 11.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S. Benge

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality Sneakers...
customer_reviews.text: I use to be an avid Avia Sneaker ownersome 20 plus years ago. I wasn't disappointed having gone back to them on this go-around. I needed a pair of sneakers light and narrow in the front for mountain biking but sturdy enough for walking around in between rides. The velcro straps are an added safety measure when biking to avoid entangling with the bike chain. Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Chef Dude...

customer_reviews.title: Junk - Fell apart with very little wear
customer_reviews.text: The sole separated from the upper with very little wear. By all appearances, the glue rotted. I would not recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fathers love. I got the wider size.
customer_reviews.text: My 77 year old father loves these. I used to get him the Gray everlasts but they haven’t been making any. This was the best I could find. I’m Buying him an extra pair because you have no idea how crazy a 77 year old man can get about their sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Loved Amazon wardrobe. Was not sure what size to get my son so ordered three different sizes. Great shoe. My son is autistic so needed a good quality shoe with velcro straps. Will purchase again. Great sturdy shoe. Nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Anita and Bill in Richmond

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: was too tall while good width, i liked the grey color though the straps felt strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Islam Ahmad

product_meta.title: Avia Mens Avi-Union 2 Soft Toe Velcro Safety Shoes
product_meta.description: Workers who need sure footing in wet or slippery environments and a strong and durable shoe will appreciate the benefits of the non-slip outsole. Hook and loop strap closure for easy entry and secure fit. " AVIA's sneakers have a shock absorption technology. Men and women across the globe prefer the AVIA training sneakers for their comfort levels, durability and amazing cushioning technology. At our store, you can shop a wide range of sizes, widths and styles of Avia Sneakers for both men and women in a variety of colors and textures. Avia sneakers will keep you feet comfortable while providing your feet with the much needed support while exercising, running or walking.
feature_bullets: Oil and Slip Resistant rubber tread pattern for enhanced grip
